battlehack17

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • battlehack17.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    A Battlehack Networked game

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      GameInfo gameInfo
      An object that stores all information about this game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(java.lang.String botname)
      Connects to the correct Battlehack server, providing the given bot name
      Game(java.lang.String botname, java.lang.String hostname, int port)
      Connects to the given Battlehack server
      Game(java.lang.String botname, java.lang.String hostname, int port, boolean reconnectInfinitely)
      Connects to a Battlehack server, endlessly trying to connect if connecting fails

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long millisecondsLeft()
      Gets the milliseconds left in your turn.
      boolean over()
      Gets if the game is over
      void queueAction(Action whatAction)
      Queue a raw action -- WARNING: You have to provide a raw action! Use gameInfo.local or gameInfo.network for managed actions
      void sendTurn()
      Send your turn to be processed by the server (end your turn)
      void waitForStart()
      Wait for the start of the game
      void waitTillNextTurn()
      Waits until the next turn, and updates GameInfo when it gets it.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • waitForStart

        public void waitForStart()
                  throws ServerNoStartException
        Wait for the start of the game
        Throws:
        ServerNoStartException - Thrown if the next message recieved from the server is not correct.

      • waitTillNextTurn

        public void waitTillNextTurn()
        Waits until the next turn, and updates GameInfo when it gets it. Updates on every player's turn, not just your own.

      • queueAction

        public void queueAction(Action whatAction)
        Queue a raw action -- WARNING: You have to provide a raw action! Use gameInfo.local or gameInfo.network for managed actions
        Parameters:
        whatAction - A raw action to queue

      • sendTurn

        public void sendTurn()
        Send your turn to be processed by the server (end your turn)

      • over

        public boolean over()
        Gets if the game is over
        Returns:
        If the game is over

      • millisecondsLeft

        public long millisecondsLeft()
        Gets the milliseconds left in your turn.
        Returns:
        The number of milliseconds left you can process this turn.
